code: import{useContext}from"react";import CurrentUserContext from"../../contexts/CurrentUserContext";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Card(_ref){let{card,onCardClick,onDelCard,onCardLike}=_ref;const currentUser=useContext(CurrentUserContext);const isOwn=card.owner===currentUser._id;const isLiked=card.likes.some(i=>i===currentUser._id);const cardLikeBtnClassName="place__like-btn style-btn ".concat(isLiked&&"place__like-btn_active");const handleLikeClick=()=>{onCardLike(card);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"place",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:card.link,alt:card.name,className:"place__image",onClick:()=>onCardClick({link:card.link,name:card.name})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"place__info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{className:"place__title",children:[" ",card.name," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"place__like-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:cardLikeBtnClassName,type:"button","aria-label":"\u041B\u0430\u0439\u043A",onClick:handleLikeClick}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"place__likes-number",children:card.likes.length})]})]}),isOwn&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"place__delete-btn style-btn",type:"button","aria-label":"\u041A\u043E\u0440\u0437\u0438\u043D\u0430",onClick:()=>onDelCard(card._id)})]});}
